content.text: To design a WOW-site of a culturally significant project for all types of devices, including WEBVR.

The project was made while working at Jetstyle. With the art director and illustrator, I made a model and collected some cases, I designed and made up a desktop version, helped the illustrator with the design.

During this project I worked with WEBVR for the first time. I figured out the nuances of developing a design. I worked with the THREE.JS library, it was my first time developing such a big project using this library.
